name: NOTESCAPE (DUROXOID)
description:
Notescape is a fun rhythm based game in which the goal is to land on notes to destroy enemies. Jump with space and slam notes with a down stomp as they pass - but don't land on the enemies! They are sharp!

Because they are sharps.

You move faster as you go, and you will notice that the speed of enemies also increases; making the game very fast paced and exciting. Enjoy!
